Title: Relates to allowing for a program sponsor to amend a point system as part of a service award program
Summary: Allows for a program sponsor to amend a point system as part of a service award program.
LawCode: Amd ยง217, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing for a program sponsor to amend a point system as part of a service award program
